hero.title: Replace Cover Letters with AI Interviews
hero.subtitle: Naturally filter candidates with instant phone interviews conducted by AI

problem.title: The Problem
problem.description: In recruitment, cover letters once served as a natural filter for candidates. Why? Because writing a good letter took an hour or more. Only truly motivated candidates took the time to write one.
problem.aiImpact: Today, with ChatGPT and AI, a cover letter can be generated in 5 minutes. Result: the natural pre-filter has disappeared.
consequences: Recruiters receive hundreds of generic applications.
The candidate's genuine interest has become impossible to measure.
Sorting applications becomes inefficient and costly.

solution.title: The Solution
solution.description: We replace the cover letter with an instant phone interview with an AI.

steps.title: How it works?
steps.step1: The candidate clicks on "Apply and take the call" â†’ they receive an instant or scheduled call.
steps.step2: An AI asks them personalized questions about their motivation, skills, and even technical questions depending on the customization chosen.
steps.step3: The interview is recorded, transcribed, and analyzed to provide recruiters with a structured summary.

benefits.title: Why it works?
benefits.description: Taking a call is more engaging than generating a letter in 5 minutes. It's a new natural pre-filter: only truly motivated candidates who believe they have the skills will go through with it.

list.title: The Added Value
list.authenticity: Authenticity: Impossible to copy-paste an AI response, candidates must express themselves spontaneously.
list.timeEfficiency: Time-saving: No need to read letters, the recruiter directly receives a summary and a score.
list.engagement: Better engagement: A modern and dynamic experience for candidates.
list.softSkills: Soft skills analyzed from step 1: Clarity of expression, structuring of ideas, oral fluency.

market.title: The Market
market.description: The digital recruitment market is rapidly evolving. With players like LinkedIn, Workday, or SmartRecruiters, companies are looking for smarter tools to efficiently sort applications.

businessModel.title: The Business Model
businessModel.b2b: B2B SaaS: Monthly subscription based on recruitment volume.
businessModel.premium: Premium Option: Advanced analysis of responses with AI, integration with ATS (Applicant Tracking System).

conclusion.title: Conclusion
conclusion.description: Recruitment has changed, but the tools haven't kept up. The cover letter is dead. We offer its intelligent, fast, and authentic replacement.
